titleStmt.title: A geographicall and anthologicall description of all the empires and kingdomes, both of continent and ilands in this terrestriall globe Relating their scituations, manners, customes, prouinces, and gouernements.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Robert, 1588-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[otes] for Simon VVaterson, dwelling at the signe of the Crowne in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A geographicall description of the whole worlde.
Reproduction of the original in the Library of Congress.

place.placeName: the signe of the Crowne in Paules Church-yard
